description: Fire Heat is a 2D simulation sports game! Immerse yourself in the world of sports and entertainment. You will have a completely unusual approach to sports games, knock down skittles with a butterfly knife throw, throw glass bottles into rings or kick a cake instead of a ball.

name: Crave
description: Ceaseless hunger draws you yet a bit closer to the gates of Foghorn. Devour men and beasts alike to acquire a wide array of combat abilities. Through shadows and mold, track down the paling memories of this bygone kingdom, all in a classic hand-drawn action platformer.

name: Lamborghini
description: Lamborghini was a cancelled racing video game that was developed by Rage Software and would have been published by Majesco Entertainment.

name: Return to the Roots
description:
Return to the Roots is an open source fan remake of The Settlers II.

With a completely rewritten game engine 'RttR' aims to support modern hardware and operating systems and extend the original The Settlers II with features such as a multiplayer mode via internet.

You will need an original "The Settlers 2 Gold Edition" version to play as Return To The Roots uses the original sounds and graphics.

name: Ertha
description: Ertha is an economic, social MMORPG, designed to replicate a real-life environment, simulating the actions that people have to perform to earn a living. Explore and dominate the world!

name: Bookstore Simulator
description: This is a realistic Bookstore where you can read real books of several different topics. Interested in learning about business communication, world history, Rome, Greece? Into fiction and romance? Find and read any book in this realistic virtual bookstore.

name: Fresh Out the Oven
description: Fresh Out the Oven is a relaxing single-player cooking and business management game. You'll go through 20 varying mini-games as you discover new types of food to cook, and if you take too long you'll burn it! As you move on up you expand your restaurant and can design it however you want.

name: Super Gosu Cars
description: Arcade racing action mixed with kart racing combat! Up to 8 players in local multiplayer! Lots of different vehicles, drivers and tracks to try out and more yet to unlock! Go for gold in the Grand Prix! Hone your skills in Time Trial! Run wild in Custom Tournaments! - It's Super Gosu Cars time!

Clear a path to the treasure chest in each level to advance to the next stage as you travel the globe. As you advance you'll play exciting minigames and fun puzzles! Bask in the beauty of the sea and experience the exciting Match 3 gameplay. Can you travel from ocean to ocean and help your friendly crab?

name: Farm Mystery: The Happy Orchard Nightmare
description: If you go down to the farm tonight you’re in for a big surprise! Everything is not what it seems down on Happy Orchard Farm, as residents of the local town have mysteriously disappeared. Is there an innocent explanation, or could the farm be at the mercy of supernatural forces? It’s up to you to discover the secrets of the farm and uncover the chilling mystery! Search for objects, collect key items, and solve mini-games and puzzles all set in the seemingly haunted farm. Can you conquer your fears and discover the truth in this thrilling supernatural adventure game?

name: Exorcist 3: Inception of Darkness
description: In the middle of a forested archaeological encampment surrounded by long deserted dwellings and artifacts, we again find Garret Ghostfighter. He has been summoned here to investigate the strange disappearances of scientists, as well as his own godson, Jacob. The missing vanish without a trace and screams are heard at night. Which new evil are we to fight this time? Find out in Inception of Darkness: Exorcist 3.

Starting from a small village, develop your settlement into the most powerful civilization, the cradle of all civilizations! Collect resources, construct various buildings, and finish with the Pyramids of Giza, the Sphinx, and other magnificent temples!

name: Band of Mercenaries
description: Band of Mercenaries is a couch one-hit kill respawning arena game in which your lives (respawns) are the mercenaries you hired. To win you can either be good on the battlefield or have money sense to make the battle unbalance from the start.

Hold on tight for a thrill ride that will keep you guessing up until the shocking surprise ending. Join this whirlwind adventure in Hide & Secret 2: Cliffhanger Castle!

name: Silent Scream: The Dancer
description: You, as Jennifer, have to solve a perplexing mystery and save her only daughter in Silent Scream: The Dancer! After leaving work one night, Jennifer is chased by a mysterious group of people. She is almost successful in her escape, but is knocked unconscious. After waking up, she discovers that her daughter has been kidnapped! Help her track down her daughter and save the day in this exciting Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game!

name: The Bird's Realm 3
description: This is another simple calm open world bird flying simulator! There are no goals or quests, just simply flying around this large island in a sandbox open world to kill time. Find glowing eggs to unlock a bird.

name: Blacksmith War
description: There was a war between the east and the west, and as a blacksmith, you provided various weapons to the soldiers on the front line. From the initial dagger and short sword, to the sophisticated two-handed sword. For the sake of the warriors, please work hard to build the best weapons.

name: Potions War
description: There is a war between the east and the west, and as a pharmacist, you provide various potions to the soldiers on the front line. From the initial life potion and magic potion to the power potion and speed potion that increases the speed of the warrior's body.

name: Ball Hunter
description: The hunter embarks on a journey into the deep forest of Tiger Mountain. Discover the secrets of the deepest part of the forest, unravel the mysteries of animals turning into spheres, and restore the forest to its original appearance.

name: Wood Cuter
description: The trees outside the village began to grow wildly, blocking the road and occupying the farmland.， Explore the deepest part of the forest, unlock the secrets of the wild growth of trees, and restore the forest to its former calm

name: Miner Rush
description: A large number of gem mines have been found in the forest. Explore the deepest part of the forest, Dig out the biggest and most beautiful gem king before everyone else

name: Tankitos
description: You can choose if you want to play solo missions or just enjoy some fun with your friends in online. Solo missions has same rules as in original "Battle City" game. Player have to protect his base against enemies. Enemies are spawned with different level and power. If player survive all enemies, player wins and can continue to next level, if player lost his all lives, player loosed and must play again. Most of walls are destroyable and those ones contains pickable items like, healths, armor and variety of weapons.

name: PokeQuest VR
description:
PokéQuest VR is a Pokémon MMO built from the ground up. Players can socialize, trade, battle and hunt together throughout multiple regions.

PokéQuest was designed to bring back the nostalgia of the original games, and experience it in VR.

The game is multiplayer only and requires an internet connection to play.

name: Among the Trolls
description: Among the Trolls is a first-person, survival, action-adventure game where the strange mysteries of Finnish forests are unraveled. Embark on a quest to find your vanished grandparents and learn how to survive in the wilderness.

name: Treasure Seekers: Follow the Ghosts Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Midnight Guns
description: A tactical/arena shooter with a focus on movement, dynamic level interaction, and throwing rats at each other. Sometimes involves shooting.

name: Super Evolution Illustrated: War World
description: Super Evolution Illustrated adopts a unique multi-choice evolution mechanism, which can customize the evolution direction of Digimon. Each Digimon can break through the upper limit and achieve ultimate combat power. Here, Digimon are not just companions in battle, they also have their own stories. Here, a new adventure in your name is about to begin. Be the next to be called and go now!

name: Dragons Garden: Merge 3 Game
description: Travel to the Dragons Land, use your magic to purify poisoned lands, become friends with wondrous, fantastic Dragons and merge together your very own fantasy land in this No.1 merging and collecting game: Dragons Garden.

name: Paradise Island Driver
description: Start your driving adventure on a beautiful island! When you feel warmed up, mix things up and hop into a sports car, quad bike or even a massive bus. This is a racing game that will bring the sun into your life! FEATURES: ▶ 13 UNIQUE CARS: Dune buggy, f…

name: Shell Soldier
description: Shell Soldier is an intense first person game that takes place in a dystopian future. Featuring frenetic firefights with a diverse set of enemy combatants ranging from tactics to weaponry, and also a large variety of deadly weapons at your disposal.

name: The Syber Virus
description: This is a casual rpg game, there are twelve levels from different challenges. You control the main role, with a little bit delicate play skill,to eliminate enemies.You can collect resources inside game to buy items and enhance your role...like a RPG,anyway.

name: Alone in the Grey
description: Alone in the Grey is a first person adventure puzzle game where the player must escape from a UFO they have mysteriously awoke in. Uncover clues and solve puzzles to escape and find out the reason for your capture. Hack terminals and find batteries to obtain freedom.

name: Ethos: Divinity's Curse
description: Journey through the kingdom of Lyrak and its neighboring lands where you'll have to defeat great foes to earn a second chance at life through a mysterious divine entity.

name: Stick Go story
description: Stick Go story is a single-player indie game. It attempts to link strategy board games with fighting RPG games. The stickman-like characters can be regarded as 11 Go pieces, and you can fight against enemies by moving these pieces with some strategy.

name: Princess of Seas
description: Princess of Seas is a sea sailing with Open-World, Sandbox, Quest, Explore, Sea Battle. Let's go and save this world.

name: Battle Chain
description: A fun multiplayer battle arena, that will incorporate a global leaderboard soon!

name: Reflection
description: Reflection is a VR puzzle game with a traditional Chinese ring to it. Tracing back to the fifth chapter in Dream of the Red Chamber, the game draws inspiration from Jia Baoyu’s visit to The land of Faery, and advances to create a brand-new game using mirrors to solve puzzles.

name: Guacamojo
description: Finally, it's the turtle's turn to rise! Spin, jump, and smash your way through dozens of tricky old-school platforming levels, all with unique gimmicks and mechanics, to challenge even seasoned platform gamers.

name: Cabinet of Curiosities VR
description: This is a fully immersive and interactive VR Experience set in a Victorian style Cabinet of Curiosities room, full of hundreds of highly detailed 3D scanned objects from the natural world, that can be picked up, examined, and explored like a museum without restrictions.

name: Metroland
description: Become a transport tycoon in the 1900s London. Expand transport lines, housing, and businesses to fund your transport empire. Make use of urban planning to create communities that will use your services.

name: TowerFall with Friends
description: A very simple Mario Party inspired mini-game / platformer where you have to watch the color of the flags and quickly run your character to the matching colored platform before the rest get lowered!

name: Warehuman
description: Game theme: JRPGs that talk about violence and mythology Read the story from the point of view of a character from a 'discriminated race' to think deeply about discrimination. In the combat part, the tense BP battle system offers the thrill of 'hunt or be hunted'.

name: Winter tramp
description: Winter tramp - A story about a tramp who has to overcome many trials, pain and mysteries on his difficult path. The next 40 kilometers are filled with robbers and wild animals.

name: Ocean Riders
description: Watercraft racing game with accurate physics simulation in a fantastic setting with overpowered turbojet engines and huge waves.

name: A Piano Tale
description: A Piano Tale immerses the player in the life of musician Alexandra Aaronovitch and her father Boris. Can you help Alexandra find the fragments of the secret concerto for piano and orchestra written by Boris, and play it? Travel to the cultural capitals of Vienna and St. Petersburg.

name: Carrot: Pancakes and Waffles
description: a slice of life game where you live a peaceful day in a whimsical hand-painted coastal town

name: 7th Sign
description: 7th sign is a classic 2D-platformer action game inspired by games likes Doom, Quake, Abuse and Painkiller. Our goal is to entertain the player with massive enemy fights, boss fights and stirring music.

name: Shooting girl
description: It's a casual stress-busting shooter game where you beat enemies to get gold for upgrades and unlock weapons and the more levels it is, you have to think about how do you complete the game by refine Weapons . Also there alot fun things like turntable flip cards and other mini-games and CG in here.

name: Toons City
description: Toons City is a modified version of the classic city simulation. The game introduces gameplay elements to reproduce the sensations and difficulties inherent in creating and managing a real small town.

name: Rogue Soulstone
description: Collect the Rogue Soulstones in this physics-based, fast-paced action roguelike RPG to achieve ultimate power. Learn spells to create powerful synergies, decimate hordes of corrupted souls, face titanic bosses, die, upgrade and try again with a new build.

name: Seneca 7: A Cyberpunk Odyssey
description: Build a new life in a cozy cyberpunk adventure RPG! Polluted air having you gasping for breath? Drowning in endless debt? Online dating getting you nowhere? Leave your worries behind and reboot your life on Seneca 7, where dreams come true!

name: Galactic Merchant
description:
Galactic Merchant is sci-fi business simulator (aka space tycoon game). Starting from small startup with single cargo ship you can grow your company to intergalactic monopoly.

To do so, you could trade, prospect, produce goods, smuggle, rob, give bribes, engage in politics, save lives and use many other options.
During the game you will learn many economical concepts and built-in calculation sheet will help you to use them in practice.

name: The Alpinist
description: Make your way up the mountain with your ice axe and your grappling hook. Hold tight, watch your steps and make sure not to fall, you never know how far you're gonna land.

name: Godless grove
description: Godless grove - survival horror with elements of a hunting simulator in an open world filled with horrors. Uncover the terrible secrets of the locals and overcome the disgusting creatures of evil that have gathered over this grove.

name: VR Robot Fight
description: Cute catgirl fights with you We designed the opponent to be a cute catgirl, and under the VR perspective, players can experience a cute feeling in the battle.

name: Dead-End Dungeons
description: Dead-End Dungeons is a randomly generated dungeon crawler featuring turn-based combat. Dungeons are completely random and feature various encounters, treasures, and unlockables.

name: Escape the Unknown
description: Escape the Unknow is ¾ view dungeon crawler rogue-like game that is broken up into chapters. Players will embark on a journey of discovery as they regain their memory through a world of secrets.

name: Realm of Cubes
description: Realm Of Cubes is a voxel-based action adventure RPG. It takes place in a handcrafted voxel Fantasy world!

name: Thorn Demon Hunter
description: This is an AVG game similar to Metroidvania. The player will perform a demon hunter exploring and decrypting the castle in the Gothic period and hunting the corrupt soul

name: Space Worthy
description: Space Worthy is atompunk science simulator. Use science to save the crew of your wrecked ship. This was supposed be holiday for young scientists on scientific educational pkanet. Now you really have to learn something if you want to get back. Find new parts, learn how to use them, build electronics.

name: Echoes of the Stars
description: Echoes of the Stars is a modern action-JRPG standing on the shoulders of the classics. Follow Rin and Eldric in a tale of two souls, bound together by fate in an epic tale of time, space, love, laughter, and the human condition as they challenge those who seek to destroy existence as we know it.

name: Furry Nights
description: Are you winning son?!

name: Shadow's Kiss
description: A modern gothic vampire online RPG featuring turn based combat, intrigue, horror, and mature themes.

name: Pitchfork Kingdom
description: Pitchfork Kingdom is a 2D hack-and-slash where each level is full of exciting combat, obstacles, and adventure.

name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War - Ragnarök Campaign & Character Pack
description: The nightmare is almost over, but the few surviving members of the Hell Cult have retreated deep into Hell, and have put into motion the mysterious Projekt Ragnarök.

name: Brave Builder Construct A Climb
description: procedural generated 2d puzzle platformer

name: Knights of the Exploding Table
description: Knights of the Exploding Table is an explosive platformer that harkens unto the late 90's era of 3D games. Place, kick, lift, and throw bombs to navigate your way to the end of each stage. Collect gems to buy hats and unlock an extra stage. Challenge your friends to exhilarating Explosion Battles!

name: Dear Delusion
description: A little girl goes missing, you breaks into the forest restricted area to find her. However, as you explore deeper into the forest, the line between reality and fantasy fades away. Can the you piece together the whole picture, find the little girl and leave the forest?

name: Pumpkin Story
description: Within the country of Sunderlin there is a Cute Spooky Story, nikkis pumpkin story with your best pal asuka to guide you a game of wonder and excitement, you can go through dungeons with puzzles, secrets and a collection of music notes! fighting brooms with bombs, lanterns, fireflies and magic!

name: Space Spider
description: In the boundless universe, wage an inspiring battle with alien civilizations to defend your last home. Face stronger enemies and get stronger supplies and incentives.

name: Resbs
description: Resbs is a first-person space survival simulation where you and your friends cooperate to survive in zero gravity on a space station!

name: Pestilent Hunters
description: Welcome to europe, home to one of the most cruel and deadly diseases to ever plague humanity, the plague, the black plague. Join the Pestilent Hunters and you'll have to face a variety of disgusting monsters to try to prevent the end of humanity in this frantic roguelike!

name: Bleach
description: The Fantasy Girls RPG Gacha Game

name: Legends from Lacoytas: The First Seeker
description: The First Seeker is a challenging top down shooter where you will shoot and slash your way through enemies.

name: One Shot
description: One Shot is a Ultra Dynamic shooter when you try to survive against a waves of enemy and fight a "final boss" at the end of each waves.

name: Otter Chaos
description: Otter chaos is a 3D cute, cooperative puzzle solving game where you play as otters who scramble to chase their mischievous babies back home before the zookeeper notices!

name: Block Fight
description: It's a tower defense game that uses blocks to build fortresses against monsters. Gathering resources, building defenses, and keeping an eye out for the abilities of a variety of monsters.All of these will challenge the player's strategic choices, resource management, and immediate reactions.

name: Forsaken Champions
description: Forsaken Champions is a one-of-a-kind blend of ARPG and CRPG. Freedom is yours, build, adapt and complete your campaigns then play them to your liking ! Embark in your heroic adventures to live with your friends, however beware of the mood of the adventure master !

name: Thirayan
description: Thirayan is an action platformer game set in India. A hand-drawn action platformer game offering players new experience with its story and art.

name: Where the Stars Brought Us
description: “Where The Stars Brought Us” is a visual novel game about a boy, Ryo Yung, who is from Seoul, South Korea. He and his family (mother, father, and sister) take what was meant to be a week-long trip to Tokyo, Japan. This begins Ryo’s many adventures.

name: Nedia Hotel
description: Experience the thrill of not being able to do anything but run from the horrors within the Nedia Hotel. A First person, PSX stylised Horror game that takes you to Nedia hotel to finish a simple task of carrying 8 plates! Though, is it really that simple?

name: WestFallen
description: Story-driven open world RPG that throws you into a grand adventure in the world of WestFallen. Explore, quest, and fight your way through the world as you seek to avenge your family. Explore and experience the world of WestFallen as you follow the story or go your own way.

name: inAntrum
description: inAntrum is an atmospheric 3D Action-Adventure-RPG developed as game series and released in five parts. It combines Action-RPG elements as well as Adventure-Puzzle elements and a stylized 3D graphic in an entirely new fantasy setting.

name: Eye For Eye
description: Fast Paced Visceral Action. First-Person arena combat.

name: Monkey Adventure
description: Run, jump, attack, explore. Cross the various dangers and reach the destination.

name: Model Builder: Expansion Pack no.1
description: Model Builder: Expansion Pack no.1 contains four new models: a tank, plane, fantasy figurine, and a boat! Every new model is linked to a new quest and new Steam Achievement! Get them all!

name: Fabled Kingdom
description: Explore the crumbling ruins of a ancient kingdom. Uncover it's mysterious and powerful artifacts and combine their effects to destroy the dangerous defenses that hide within The Fabled Kingdom.

name: Davy's Debris
description: Davy’s Debris is a fast-paced action beat ‘em up where you pick up trash. Launch your long arms to grab your enemies and fling them across the screen on your mission to clean all the trash off the beach.

name: The Backrooms: Deeper
description: A first person immersive experience into The Backrooms. Experience them as a scientist working for [REDACTED] . Solve puzzles to advance the many halls of surreal terror. Take photographs for your team to see if The Backrooms are a reality, or just your sanity dripping away.

name: Skotos: Levels Pack
description: With the levels pack for Skotos, you can unlock 9 new levels, new variants of the puppetmaster clown, and new platforms to traverse across.

name: Stripped of Title: Backlash - Episode 1
description: Stripped of Title is an adult quest that follows the story of Bernadette. Forced to pay her Father's debt, she was reduced to poverty. Hunger, irregular work, demanding clients - her life is a nightmare. One day she learns about an ancient treasure, and the following events change her life forever.

name: Legend of a Soul Hunter
description: Legend of a Soul Hunter is an action-adventure game with RPG elements. Explore islands and many individual dungeons by ship. Get items with different abilities, defeat monsters and become a successful soul hunter!

name: Lightout 2
description: Lightout 2 is a psychological horror game with a scary atmosphere, the game takes place in an Abandoned hospital.

name: Idle Business Tycoon: Build Simulator - Expansion Pack 2
description: Expand and grow! The possibilities are plenty in Idle Business Tycoon - Build Simulator - Expansion Pack 2. Earn money to unlock new establishments and expand your business all over town. The more you build, the more money you make!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters Castellan Champion Upgrade Pack
description: The Castellan Champion Upgrade Pack includes the unique playable character Castellan Garran Crowe, and the Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate – Daemonhunters Original Soundtrack.

name: Astortion
description: Astortion is a minimalistic, atmospheric puzzle-platformer that revolves around gravity. Explore the ruins of the most pivotal research facility on earth, unlock new abilities that mess with spacetime itself, and get to the bottom of what is going on.

name: Faith & Shield: 4044 Tower Defense
description: Faith & Shield: 4044 Tower Defense game, where you protect the human settlement from the incoming invaders, robots and other creatures, never seen before on our planet.

name: War in Europe: 1940
description: War in Europe: 1940 is inspired by classic FPS and historical operations happened during 1940 in Europe where you will fight along two campaigns(Axis and Allies) allowing you to fight in the conflict in both sides.

name: Dreaming Worlds
description: Dive into the dreaming worlds of the four dream keepers and find out why they don't answer anymore. Rescue the trapped inhabitants of the dream worlds, change the dreams back to good and discover mysterious places and puzzles. But something dark will stand in your way.

name: Nuts Space Shooter
description: Repel extraterrestrial entities!

name: Bum Simulator VR
description: Bum Simulator VR is a sandbox game bursting with humor and memorable characters. You live on the streets of Bumsville. Do you have what it takes to adapt, survive and become an urban legend?

name: Expansion Core
description: Expansion Core is a Nomadic Survival game that borrows both first person and real time strategy elements. Gather resources, craft tools and build allies to help you survive. Inventory management is key as you move throughout the landscape.

name: The Spirit in the Woods
description: Your journey begins now, Kuara Bay has become one of the few habitable places on earth, but there is still hope for a fresh start. The future is in your hands, with some tools to start and wonderful people by your side, starting this new adventure in a forgotten corner of Brazil.

name: Mawthorne
description: Explore the ancient underground of this strange, alien world in this metroidvania platformer! Navigate your way through 9 different areas of the underground and encounter powerful bosses that make you stronger, open paths, or alter other areas of the world!

name: Foreclosure Simulator
description: Manage a bailiff in Foreclosure Simulator. Do business, earn money, buy new houses and vehicles. Decorate your home and garden according to your imagination. Enjoy the open world.

name: AteloPhobia:The Story Begins
description: AteloPhobia is a game with elements of Point&Click, RPG and horror. Something is hiding in the basement of the house... And it's definitely not rats.As you descend, you begin your terrifying and deadly adventure.

name: Nano Organism
description: Nano Organism - is a real-time strategy game, you control nano cells to control the entire organism, lots of puzzles, dynamic progression, lots of research, achievements, free choice of development direction and progression.

name: Festival
description: Festival is a role playing game that tells a story about the foolish games and roles we play. Set in a renaissance festival & surrounding modern city; Explore a fully-voiced uniquely-written open world, solve mysteries, battle creepies and loot your perfect new gear. Do you believe in magic?

name: Goog
description: Goog is a top down survival game with bullet elements. Explore GOOG and discover the secrets of this strange world. Defeat the idols of this world on a path to discover who you are and why you're here.

name: Eternal Samurai
description: Possess your enemies and take revenge against the evil lords of the land in this retro-platformer action game

name: The Elf Maiden
description: You are the Fair Maiden. Walk upon the lands to gather the souls of fallen warriors from past events and escort them to the Holy Land. Fight to gain power and free the fallen who deserve rest and peace.

name: Macabre
description: A multiplayer horror game where you work with (or against) other players to solve randomised puzzles in procedural maps. As you search for clues, you'll need to watch your back as there are cunning creatures from beyond this world watching your every move, waiting for the opportune moment to strike!

name: The Forgotten Boundary
description: "The Forgotten Boundary" is a stand-alone independent game based on magic tower strategy puzzle solving, map exploration, and dungeon challenge.

name: UnderWay
description: UnderWay is a graffiti game based on simulation. Alone or with your friends, paint where you want, buy your sprays (or steal them) in the different stores of the city! and try to dodge the security to paint the walls and subways of the capital.

name: The Old War
description: This is an indie-developed co-op strategy game set in a dark medieval fantasy world.

name: Ygeia
description: Ygeia is an introspective puzzle-solving adventure game in which the player must overcome a series of challenges that could lead to anxiety.

name: Miss Cecilia
description: Miss Cecilia would always be in a position, always thinking of someone who could take her away, but how could anyone ever show up?

name: Speed is Key
description: Speed is Key is a tough, fast-paced precision platformer where, well... speed is key.

name: Dark Desire 2
description: This visual novel continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics.

name: Murdo's Quest
description: Rescue your family and defeat Count Othar in this old-school platformer. Inspired by the "Addams Family" game for the NES. This game presents a unique and challenging platforming experience.

name: Pandaman
description: Action design The monster moves widely, sometimes blinking, sometimes surprising, sometimes funny and ironic, With complete sound effects and special effects, players can experience unparalleled tension and excitement.

name: BlastMania
description: Destroy as many robots as possible and survive until the end ! Improve your shoot, unlock abilities, upgrade your weapons and earn as many points as you can. Make the best decisions to optimize your run and reach the top of the leaderboard !

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Trains 2
description: Puzzles of Trains!

name: Blickel
description: A colorful and retro 2D platformer where you must shoot enemies, platform around tough obstacles, and race through several distinct worlds each with its own unique challenges and gameplay elements. Can you make it to the end?

name: Idle Business Tycoon: Build Simulator - Expansion Pack 1
description: Expand and grow! The possibilities are plenty in Idle Business Tycoon - Build Simulator - Expansion Pack 1. Earn money to unlock new establishments and expand your business all over town. The more you build, the more money you make!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Pack: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate - Variety Pack 20
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Summer Photo Album
description: "Summer Album" is a relaxing word game, accompany Xiao Xia to spend a fulfilling day in the morning, help her repair the album, and see what secrets will be discovered?

name: Rhythm Quest
description: Rhythm Quest is a 2-button rhythm platformer game. Jump, attack, and fly to the beat through upbeat songs that are hand-crafted to highlight complex rhythms!

name: Idle Business Tycoon: Build Simulator - Expansion Pack 3
description: Expand and grow! The possibilities are plenty in Idle Business Tycoon - Build Simulator - Expansion Pack 3. Earn money to unlock new establishments and expand your business all over town. The more you build, the more money you make!

name: Ace Breakout
description: A top down shooter game fighting against large swarms of insects alone, or recruit friends to fight along side you! Buy and craft new equipment to help you rid the world of the swarm!

name: Sword and Shadow
description: This is a moba type game. In the game, players can choose one of five different characters and destroy the enemy crystals to win. The game provides a variety of weapons, players can buy equivalent weapons according to their money reserves, or sell weapons.

name: N31
description: The open-world map in N31 gives you the freedom to explore and hit new rivals every day. Jumps and shortcuts, buy new cars, beat all the rivals to reach the first position in the Wanted list. Fight against cops and rivals using your pure driving skill.

name: Seasons
description: A precision platformer that each season introduces new mechanics and new challenges, in a beautiful and dangerous world, are you ready?

name: Beanstalk
description: Maybe there is a castle in the sky. Maybe there is a goose that lays golden eggs. And maybe your little broth won't get hurt if he falls down from the humongous beanstalk that's now growing in your garden. But you can't take any chances so you decide to climb.

name: Space Bees
description: RougeLite + Aircraft Shooter, a thrill-based game, kill the incoming enemies, upgrade your fighters and continue to face the tidal wave of enemies.

name: RMaze
description: Survive in a maze and eliminate your opponents with bombs, shurikens and melee weapons in this 2D fast action game.

name: Stay Alive
description: Stay Alive - survival in the open world. You are an operational journalist, your task is to go to Russia and take a couple of pictures about fires in the forest.

name: Pawsecuted
description: A tactical survival RPG. Play a rabbit escaping a koala-run convict camp in a procedurally generated, post-human Australian Outback. Battle hordes of emus and hire kangaroo mercenaries. Scavenge supplies, gather and trade materials, recruit followers and rebuild society.

name: The Detective
description: Detective vintage game. Ask questions, search for clues, and items. Objects can tell stories too. In your notebook, you will mark who is lying and who is telling the truth.

name: AWK: Adventures of Walker King
description: AWK follows the journey of a young DJ who returns home from boarding school to figure out his path in life. Join Walker as he navigates life in LA with his best friends, finds love, and discovers secrets - all while trying to balance his growth and newfound fame as DJ NO1.

name: 3 Club Golf
description: VR Golf with a robot. The perfect blend of actual golf skill and arcade challenge. Play alone or online at any of 12+ original and stylized golf courses. Customize everything! (including your robot caddie) Unlock challenges, find secrets, and collect prizes. It's like real golf, only more fun!

name: Sciophobia: The Fear of Shadows
description: The year is 2014 and you are a reporter with The Maire Weekly News. In search of a new article, you have dug up all you can find, until you stumble across a promising headline from 1962. Will you find the truth about The Greer Property or will you die alone wandering in the forest?

name: Mysterious Things
description: Mystic Things is a 3D find and click puzzle game in which you have to find some items on the map within a certain time.

name: Frontier
description: The year is 1809, and you have set out to find your fortune on the new frontier! But beware: the legends of Native American lore are more than just campfire stories out here... Wendigos, Skinwalkers, Yetis and more are all too real in this newfound wilderness. Build, craft, and fight to survive!

name: BoomCrash
description: BoomCrash is a small physics-based game aimed at destroying buildings and other architectural structures using explosives.

name: Desert Blossom
description: -The game is a Japanese style roleplaying game with a substantial amount of yuri content, minimal amount of yaoi and Furry content. -This is a single plot. The favorability options of some characters affect the ending of the main thread. -Each character in the game has its own graphics, CG.

name: MaDevil
description: MaDevil is a singleplayer adventure-rpg in which you are the last sane survivor of a devil-caused apocalypse.

name: Village Guardians Break
description: 「Village Guardians」 is a VR action game in which you defend your base against enemies. Switch between guns, swords, hammers, and other weapons according to the situation and your preferences to defeat the attacking robots!

name: Hype Hustle
description: Hype Hustle is a speed running 3D platformer with twitch chat interactions built in. How quickly can you find and repair your spaceship before chat destroys you!

name: For Another Day
description: Start to play in the open world to master the game! For another day is a new world that need to be discovered from scratch by you.

name: SCP: Archive
description: A cooperative multiplayer horror experience where it's up to you and your associates to make it out alive. Survival is not guaranteed, so keep everyone at an arms length and expect to have your trust broken as you're shoved into an endless black pit.

name: Scuffed
description: Scuffed is a single-player 2D movement shooter where the goal is to prove to your enemies just how much greater your capacity for violence is.

name: Dream Walk: Mortgage
description: Dream Walk: Mortgage is a top-down arcade-style game that requires on quick maneuvering and simple multitasking. While avoiding bad-guys, petting cats, and collecting sunflower seeds, you must also remember to click the interest button. Accumulate Dream-Dollars to buy new shoes and dream-houses.

name: Retrowave: Map Pack
description: Continue your exploration in the world of Retrowave with these unique new worlds!

name: Fragment time
description: Fragment time is a 2D dynamic puzzle game with different difficulties for players to choose. It can unconsciously improve hand speed and memory.

name: Bomb It!
description: Bomb It! is a action packed multiplayer game. How it works? Drop bombs, destroy blocks, pick up power-ups, eliminate other players and earn trophies to win

name: Train Sim World 2: Spirit of Steam - Liverpool Lime Street: Crewe Route
description: Step back in time and discover the soot and sounds of the romantic steam era; climb aboard iconic living locomotives hungry for coal and water, and work hard on busy passenger and freight services through historic Merseyside and Cheshire with Train Sim World 2: Spirit of Steam!

name: Black Metal
description: Colonize. Explore. Survive.

name: Drone Tinkerer
description: Drone Tinkerer is an open-world racing game with many RPG elements. In a sci-fi world full of secrets, defeat your racing opponents with speed or weapons, modify your unique drones with hundreds of upgrades, and experience mini-games and riddles to keep getting stronger to discover the truth.

name: GOT
description: Light and darkness have fought endless battles for dark resources! We must enter one side and fight it to the end!

name: Forward Defense
description: Forward Defense is a top-down 3D singleplayer tower defense game. Join the United Coalition Force and defeat incoming waves of insurgent forces.

name: Doki Doki Family: Toku Itaishitsu no Doki-doki Kazoku Seikatsu
description: A sweet life with the "Doki Doki Family”! Leave everything to the heroines and enjoy a life filled with love and affection!

name: Saturn Menace
description: It's 2320 AC your scientific exploration module has been damage by a meteor on the Saturn orbit near an old abandoned spacecraft. Must find new energy sources explore space and search a replacement for the core of your spaceship. Enjoy this singleplayer offline 80's 90's inspired sci fi movie game

name: Dodo Life
description: Dodo Life is a game about a dodo that desperately tries to find the island where its species lives, avoiding as much as possible not being extinguished on the way by cruel predators in a Jurassic era.

name: Iku Iku Succubus
description: Succubi have arrived on Earth, and it's your job to teach them humanity's ways! Your job will be anything but easy as you unravel hidden ambitions, explore human culture, and serve as tour guide for Earth's tasty delicacies. Class is starting in the magical visual novel world of Iku Iku Succubus!

name: The Golden Time in High School
description: As a high school student of Shiguang high school, you will spend three years here. What kind of students that you will be? You can choose to study hard and get a good grade.You can choose to be an assistant to teacher to help with their daily affairs. Or just have a romantic date with somebody?

name: Petrified
description: Team up with your group of hunters to track down an invisible ghost and stop it from petrifying everyone or fall victim to the ghost's wrath.

name: Sunshine Days
description:
You've been gifted the keys to a home of your own! Explore your new neighbourhood, with your friends and a cast of kooky characters full of heart!

Play with new friends and old, helping Mayor Sylvie and the other residents to make this mountain hamlet into a thriving and green community.

Your home is yours to personalise as you desire, but the village at large is one big community. Share and explore this new world together!

name: Big the Cat in Sonic the Hedgehog
description: A ROM hack for Sonic the Hedgehog which swaps Sonic for Big the Cat (from Sonic Adventure), with his moveset based on a previous mod from the same author, Sonic the Hedgehog 2: Pink Edition.

name: Super Collapse! Puzzle Gallery 5
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Farm Frenzy: Forever and Ever!
description: Sin descripción

name: E.T.: The Extra-Terrestrial - Search for Dragora
description: Sin descripción

name: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial: Return to the Green Planet
description: E.T wants to visit his friend Eliot but doesn't have a spacecraft so he builds a spacecraft using what he knows best: botany. He secretly builds a craft using only organic resources found on the Green Planet and converts an oversize turnip into a spaceship that can carry him through space back to Earth. Along the way, E.T. encounters many strange and unusual alien life forms in E.T: RETURN TO GREEN PLANET.

name: E.T.: The Extra-Terrestrial - Away from Home
description: Sin descripción

name: Epic Escapes Dark Seas, Mysteries of Ancient Inventors Atlantis, Elementary My Dear Majesty
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Emergency Room: Code Blue
description: Sin descripción

name: Tabloid Beauties
description: Sin descripción

name: Virtual League Baseball 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Paradise Island Driver
description: Explore a beautiful tropical island and pass a variety of exciting challenges and trials! Drive a dune buggy, food truck, circus truck and more!

name: Astoria VR
description: AstoriaVR takes you back into the Astoria night club in 1986, one of the few legendary places in Leipzig in the former GDR. Audio recordings of former employees, interactive objects and private conversations create a fully immersive experience of times long past.

name: Abstract World
description: Abstract top-down game with shooter elements.

name: Sunset Mall: Classic
description: It is here, the original Sunset Mall. From an older time. If you think about it, it is probably more nostalgic to play this version than the newer ones because this itself is now very old...

name: Demise Sanctuary
description: Fight hordes of otherworldly monsters and explore procedurally generated dungeons in this addicting twin-stick action roguelike with beautiful pixelart. Mastering risk/reward mechanics and creating powerful Artefact synergies will be key to survive and escape the Demise Sanctuary!

name: MP5
description: MP5 is a dynamic TPP action shooter game with arcade elements.The game was built on the Unreal Engine, has a unique, disturbing atmosphere. Take the helm of a new highly advanced combat robot and get out of a mysterious military base!

name: Tiny Arcade Racers
description: Tiny Arcade Racers is a top-down 2.5D arcade racing game. Players may choose to compete against AI drivers in the World Tour or race for the best timing in the Time Trial. In the in-game garage, players can customize the colours of their vehicles.

name: Fowl Scourge
description: In this Dark Fantasy Action-RPG you are part of a plague doctor guild where every encounter with your patients is a boss fight.

name: Damn Daniel: White Vans Adventure
description:
Damn Daniel: White Vans Adventure is an urban stylized rhythm game RPG, based on the titular character, Damn Daniel!

Daniel was invited to the Ellen show. While Daniel was asleep, his evil twin cousin Dark Daniel stole his white Vans! Now he must catch Dark Daniel before he gets on Ellen, and throws the whole world into Damnation with the power of the white Vans!

name: Recon Control: Operation Crossfire
description: Prepare to lead your squad through another deadly operation, Crossfire.

name: The Last Man
description: A topdown survival space horror where a single enemy hit can end your life

name: The Darkest Road
description: In this old-school RPG, you play as Callum and Lucia, the Trial Ones, as they find their way to be together in an epic battle that will change their and everyone else's lives.

name: AV Racer
description: A 2D top down retro style arcade racing game, with career and two player split screen modes.

name: Forsaken Barn
description: Psychological horror game focused on finding items and solving puzzles while you are being haunted by a demon.

name: Maze Dungeon
description: Maze Dungeon is a 3D voxel rogue-lite game. Cleanse a maze-like castle full of monsters and defeat the castle's corrupt king to escape!

name: Unknown Pac-man gambling game
description: A bootleg version of Pac-man made by an unknow company released in an unknow year. The game run on the same hardware as 4 En Raya, a Connect Four-type game made by the Spanish company IDSA.

name: HypeSquad
description: HypeSquad is a fast-paced, close-quarters combat game anyone can enjoy. Be creative and personalize your combat style with unique weapon combinations and augmenters.

name: SUMBR: Super Ultra Mega Battle Royale
description:
A 2-8 Player Couch Co-op, Competitive Party Game filled with chaos. Mario Kart meets Super Smash Bros. meets Jetpack Joyride meets every other game in human existence.
Race and Fight through an intergalactic 2D Battle Royale. Escaping a giant Laser Beam of Death, evading a deadly Swarm of enemy aliens, all while shooting each other, and using your Power-Up collectables.

name: Hammer vs. Evil D. in Soulfire
description: Hammer vs. Evil D. in Soulfire is an unreleased Sega Mega-CD action game based around the American rapper MC Hammer.

name: Big Brother
description: Big Brother is a cancelled PC game based on George Orwell's novel 1984.

name: Dance Dance Revolution Mario Mix 2
description: Dance Dance Revolution Mario Mix 2 is a cancelled sequel of Dance Dance Revolution Mario Mix that was planned for the Nintendo Wii. It's existence was confirmed when documents relating to the Wii hardware were leaked as a part of the July 2021 batch of the gigaleaks. It's currently unknown if development ever officially started.

name: Total War: Three Kingdoms - The Furious Wild
description: With the introduction of The Furious Wild Expansion Pack comes the first ever extension of the Total War: Three Kingdom’s map and its already rich cast of characters. Visit the jungles around Southern China and with it, the fearsome tribes of the Nanman. Will you unite the tribes of the south?

name: Umichan Sorani
description: Take the role of Zytra, a busty girl trying to get money for her sister. Will you help her get it the easy way? Or the sleazy way?

name: Construction Machines Sim
description: Now it's your time to learn to operate heavy construction machines thanks to Construction Machines SIM: Bridges, buildings and constructor trucks simulator!

name: Quick Quack
description: Sin descripción

name: Pop Pop Pop!
description: Sin descripción

name: Conflict / Resolution
description: A quirky RPG made in 72 hours about bringing a space station of aliens together to stop an evil virus...

name: Descent
description: Explore the abandoned vessel VALIS XI and piece together the secrets of the crew's disappearance.

name: Round Ogre
description: A puzzler about an Ogre who is just too excited about life. A sort-of sequel to Square Ogre.

name: Cogs of Combat
description: 2D Cover-based Carnage

name: Rolling in the Sheepe
description: 1-6 sheep compete to roll over the finish line first. Rollable shape not required.

name: Bumpers & Broadswords
description: Pog Slammers X Fire Emblem?

name: Aspen
description: Explore a mysterious shattered world rife with danger

name: The Final Boss
description: Ever wonder what the boss does without you?

name: Somnokid
description: Stave off your nightmares in this unique shmup/platformer hybrid!

name: Keymasher Ultimate
description: DESTROY YOUR KEYBOARD KUEHZUHFUIEZHUIFEDIZ

name: Lose 95
description: Sin descripción

name: Dampftraum
description: Made by Jitsu

name: A Tiny Flicker
description: Do not stay away from the light for too long though... something lurks in the shadows...

name: Not Your Mind
description: An experimental first person adventure/horror/exploration game that takes place in a dream-like world.

name: Big Mutha Truckers 2
description: The truckers return and this time you have to get Ma Jackson off the hook after being arrested for tax evasion. Bribe the jurors as you take the roll of Ma's cousin Jacob in a race to make money by trucking and trading. Drive and go almost everywhere at any time in a bigger environment than the original finding shortcuts and new towns to go trucking in. Trading is only a small part of the game and has been simplified to allow more time driving.

name: Roots of Tomorrow: Beekeeping
description: Install beehives on all your farms! Produce and sell honey and explore the challenges of beekeeping !

name: Roots of Tomorrow: Additional Characters
description: Includes 4 new additional characters with unique perks !

name: Space Shuttle
description: Sin descripción

name: Construction Machines SIM: Bridges, buildings and constructor trucks simulator
description: Have you ever imagined driving a concrete pump, bulldozer or even a tower crane? Discover the new construction game.

name: Shump Mania
description: Challenge yourself to complete this classic retro-style adventure

name: Ghostlight Melancholia
description: Ghostlight Melancholia is a retro horror first person mystery solving game, where you find out what connects the four ghostlights, the evil that is after them and the secrets behind it all.

name: Arsilon
description: Arsilon - the adventure of astronaut Alice on another planet. After a crash landing, she needs to find and collect the lost spaceship components. On spacious maps, mortal dangers will lie in wait for her. To get to special places, you have to find a non-obvious path.

name: Monstopia: Chronicle of Jade's
description: Stop bad cat warriors so that Jade can run a store in the strategy defense game "Monstopia".

name: Wild Wild West: The Steel Assassin
description: Sin descripción

name: Wine Tycoon
description: Sin descripción

name: WingNuts
description: Sin descripción

name: Witches' Legacy: Lair of the Witch Queen & Witches' Legacy: Hunter and the Hunted
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Robo Blast!
description: "It’s a Robo Blast from the past!" It’s time for a brand new version of Sonic Robo Blast! The classic fan game last updated back in 1998, modernized with love and care on the Core Plus Framework! Take control of Sonic, Tails, Knuckles and a special guest, as you venture through the evil scientist Doctor Eggman’s brand new base of operation: Robotropic! And put a stop to his plan to snatch all the rings on the planet!

name: Screaming Skies
description: Sin descripción

name: Automation Station
description: Explore a mysterious planet, harvest and refine resources, discover new technology, craft machines, and set up automated factories.

name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku Wo! Noroi no Ibutsu to Madoishi Bokensha-tachi: Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following;
- PS4 Game
- Acrylic Figure
- B2 Tapestry
- Soundtrack CD
- Costume DLC (While supplies last)

name: The Rhythm of the Knight
description: ROTK is a VR rhythm game based on your reflex and lightsaber skill. Deflect shots, slash projectiles, slash enemies, dodge obstacles, use your powers to break others. All this to the beat of a dark techno song in hand-crafted levels designed to match the music.

name: Edge of Infinity
description: Edge of Infinity is a multiplayer space warfare game. Enter your starship and challenge your friends to all-out battles across the stars. Each match will be unique; containing different ships, weapons, armies, and strategy - all decided by the player.

name: Pure Hold 'Em World Poker Championships
description: Play Your Cards Right!Pure Hold’em World Poker Championshipcombines stunning visuals

name: Disgaea 1 Complete: Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Disgaea 1 Complete
- Original soundtrack selection

description:
Ugo Volt was an action-adventure shooter set in a post-apocalyptic Lisbon in the 22nd century, the world would be at a detriment due to global warming and only Ugo would be able to define the destiny of humanity.
It started development in 1999 as an entry to a contest from Infogrames Portugal with the title of Fusion, placing it at 7th place. It eventually was renamed Doshowbikum: The Run when Move Interactive was formed and renamed again when the game was further in development to simply as Ugo Volt, being showcased at E3 2006.

In 2007, the game was put on hold due to financial difficulties after its fundraisers pulled out of the project, and by 2008, the company was out of business.

name: Banjo-Threeie
description:
Banjo-Threeie is a rumored third entry for the Banjo-Kazooie series that was supposedly intended to be made for the Nintendo GameCube in the early 2000s.

The game was first hinted at the end of Banjo-Tooie, in which the character Gruntilda jokingly says "Just you wait until Banjo-Threeie...", which was speculated to be evidence that the game was at one point planned by fans.

At SpaceWorld 2000, a small animation featuring characters from the Banjo-Kazooie series was shown, showing off the presence of Rare during the GameCube era of gaming. The animation features Banjo, Kazooie and Mumbo Jumbo being chased by enemies from Banjo-Tooie, all using their models from the game.

In 2002, Rare was brought by Microsoft, which caused various games developed for Nintendo systems at the time to move platforms, which would've included Banjo-Threeie.

Decades later, in 2020, the developer Gregg Mayles confirmed it to be simply a joke that fans took at face value, and the SpaceWorld demo was confirmed to simply be a showcase of how many N64 models the GameCube could render at once.

According to Mayles, a game in the same style as the first two wasn't in the plans, and they went through three different concepts, until setting on what became Banjo-Kazooie: Nuts & Bolts.
